original_text: The Lord wrote on the stones the same words that he had written before. Those were the ten special commands that he had told you before. He spoke those commands from the middle of the fire on the mountain, when you came together there. Then the Lord gave the stones to me.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그 총회 날에 산 위 불 가운데에서 너희에게 이르신 십계명을 처음과 같이 그 판에 쓰시고 그것을 내게 주시기로

sentences.original_text: The Lord wrote on the stones
the same words that he had written before
Those were the ten special commands
that he had told you before
He spoke those commands from the middle of the fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 불 한가운데서 그 명령들을 말씀하셨다

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord gave the stones to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주께서 그 돌들을 나에게 주셨다
